alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:10PM EST until December 18 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Ammonoosuc River At Bethlehem affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...Through late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water begins to flood a portion of Route 101A in Milford. Water begins to flood the property of the Milford water utilities department, properties on Intervale Road in Wilton, and the Monadnock Water parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tonight and continue falling to 6.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
